contest-event.event-date:
May 8, 2021 D European Championships
European Championships 10 Set Test and Own Choice European Championships european-championships
Malmö Concert Hall, Malmö, Skåne, Sweden Canceled due to the Corona Virus Pandemic - agin.
See EBBA's Statement on a Special Online Edition this Year: https://www.ebba.eu.com/news?article=ebba-european-online-brass-band-festival-2021
(Line Up would have been the officially qualified Bands for this Edition plus Bands qualified for 2020, confirmed by their National Band Association)
